46533: A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while traveling across town to perform landscaping work for the city’s wealthy landowners.

47769: After a newlywed’s husband apparently dies in a plane crash, she discovers that her rival for his affections is now pregnant with his child.

24357: Writer/director Samuel Benchetrit takes the helm for this laid-back crime comedy that weaves together four stories which all eventually convene at a roadside diner.
I Always Wanted to Be a Gangster

44406: Magazine reporter Jonathan Fisher, in danger of losing his job, so he ends up faking a well received story of a pimp, describing his life and crimes. But police think the story is of a real life pimp.

37605: Spike Lee produced and directed two music videos for this song. In the second video, Lee used hundreds of extras to simulate a massive political rally in Brooklyn. The extras carry signs featuring Paul Robeson, Marcus Garvey, Chuck Berry and Martin Luther King, Jr.

34872: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

29279: In the sixth and final film of the Lone Wolf and Cub series, the final conflict between Ogami Itto and the Yagyu clan is carried out.
Lone Wolf and Cub: White Heaven in Hell

28023: An Italian police inspector matches wits with a powerful European drug ring. As he comes closer to the top of the underworld organization, his odds of survival decrease.

34916: When a scroll containing valuable martial arts secrets is stolen from the Emperor, an army detachment is sent to recover it…

32881: A news-reel like movie about the early part of the French Revolution shown from the eyes of individual people, citizens of Marseille, counts in German exile and, of course, King Louis XVI showing their own small problems.

37761: A rich businessman is fed up with work, family, society, and goes with a friend to Africa, in search of another friend who had vanished there in mysterious circumstances.
Will Our Heroes Be Able to Find Their Friend Who Has Mysteriously Disappeared in Africa?

36697: A gifted teenager, dreaming of life beyond her small town, becomes inspired when a 15-year-old girl from New York moves in next door.

1371: Patrice Lumumba, the hero of Congolese independence, was not yet 30 when the first tremors of botched decolonization thrust him to the forefront of the international political arena. Lumumba’s destiny as tragic hero was charted, his assassination programmed.

49684: With the peaceful planet of Akir in peril, seven mercenaries join forces to protect it from the plottings of an intergalactic megalomaniac in this Roger Corman-produced sci-fi fantasy inspired by The Seven Samurai.

32751: An unexpected romance occurs for a female Red Army sniper and a White Army officer.

129917: A woman creates an alter ego in hopes of overcoming the trauma inflicted by men in her life.

16484: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.

3320: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have only 48 hours to locate a killer infected with bubonic plague.

1215: Improvised yet visually stunning film is a musical and poetic millennium sketch of a poor African village.

473: Three siblings must come to terms with their mother’s mortality as they decide what to do with her valuable belongings in this family drama from filmmaker Olivier Assayas.

3244: When Adams and his crew are sent to investigate the silence from a planet inhabited by scientists, he finds all but two have died.

96318: A contemplative short film portraying the peasant life in rural Poland.

108446: A high-school outsider’s plot to revenge herself on the captain of the football team turns bloody when some phantasmagorical hijinks get tossed into the mix, in this refreshingly smart horror comedy from directors Lucky McKee and Chris Sivertson.

32635: The King of Vampires really exists and is alive – in 20th Century London.

25022: The push-buttons on a radio, a glass of water with an effervescent tablet, an alarm clock, men and women in a room. With Lodewijk de Boer, Tineke, Moniek Toebosch and Trix Zwartjes.

Tokyo Tower: Mom and Me, and Sometimes Dad

46904: The film shows the story of life on a Danish boarding school for boys in the seventies. The focus is on the conflict between the headmasters old fashioned view of life and the much more liberal views of the boys.

26229: When Tamara Drewe returns to the village of her youth, life for the locals is thrown upside down. Tamara – once an ugly duckling – has been transformed and is now a minor celebrity and begins a comedy of manners with the townsfolk.

38655: Greg Powell is a disturbed ex-con who recruits Jimmy Smith, a petty thief, as his partner in crime. Powell panics one night when the two of them are pulled over by a pair of cops for broken brake-lights. Powell decides to kidnap the cops and Smith reluctantly goes along with Powell’s scheme.

9224: During the Civil War, a Southern civilian is about to be hanged for attempting to sabotage a railway bridge. When the execution takes place from the bridge, the rope breaks and he begins his escape toward home.
An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge

46860: A middle aged Aboriginal woman nurses her dying old white mother till the mother dies.

42676: Based on the novel ‘Les Liaisons Dangereuses,’ this film is set in aristocratic 18th-century Korea at the end of the Chosun Dynasty. The irresistible temptress Lady Cho asks her cad of a younger cousin, Jo-won, to deflower the innocent young Soh-ok, who is to become her husband’s concubine.

47996: Marcia is determined to end the cycle of poverty for her family and when she discovers that her daughter is dating an older professor, she will stop at nothing to end this unwelcome relationship.

107416: A ghostly figure warns an isolated signalman to expect imminent danger. Its previous warnings pre-empted deaths on the line…

38985: In this romantic comedy, three American roommates working in Italy wish for the man of their dreams after throwing coins into Rome’s magnificent Trevi Fountain.

41801: Wan Tin-sau is a struggling actor who has devoted his life to the study of his craft, but unfortunately the moment he gets on a film set, disaster usually strikes. However, Wan refuses to give up, and is busy trying to stage a traditional Chinese drama…

41965: A detective is assigned to head a manhunt for four violent bank robbers.

106728: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

40743: Social worker tries to befriend local slum gang.

23219: Three brothers on their way to the circus must cope with the youngest boy’s fear of clowns. Little do they know that a trio of violent madmen have murdered the circus’ real clowns and, after adopting their guise, are savaging the townspeople at random.

25978: Leatherface and the gang are back and this time something entirely new is cooking in this darkly humorous sequel to Tobe Hooper’s terror classic.

27929: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.
The Man Who Knew Too Little

41393: A dramatic recreation of the Wannsee Conference where the Nazi Final Solution phase of the Holocaust was devised.

45331: Tommy, 10 years old, is well known by Social Services. He is considered a danger to society. Gilles, his guardian at this halfway house, sees potential for redemption in this kid driven by violence.

Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama

121118: The Spanish deep South, 1980. A series of brutal murders of adolescent girls in a remote and forgotten town bring together two disparate characters – both detectives in the homicide division – to investigate the cases.

65122: When housekeeper Grace Hawkins arrives at the Goodfellow vicarage, she finds a reverend too busy for sex, a bored wife who’s bedding her golf instructor, a promiscuous teenage daughter and a bullied son.

39129: Lara Croft is back in action and faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora’s box.
Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life

25460: A moving true story about volunteers protecting antelope against poachers in the severe mountains of Tibet.

97500: A team of parapsychologists try to figure out a strange phenomena occurring in an apartment building.

1657: The Bride’s quest for vengeance continues as she seeks out the remaining members of the gang of assassins who left her for dead: a sleazy bouncer, a one-eyed vixen, and the titular Bill.

110993: When a freak hurricane swamps Los Angeles, nature’s deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air as thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace.

155: In the year following the Paris riots of 1968, a young poet (Louis Garrel) dodging military service falls for a beautiful sculptor (Clothilde Hesme).

2538: Dr. John Holden ventures to London to attend a paranormal psychology symposium with the intention to expose devil cult leader, Julian Karswell.

95849: Another of Brakhage’s works of “moving visual thinking,” Rage Net harks back to the vibrant pioneering experiments of European animators Oskar Fischinger and Viking Eggeling.

33149: A film about quiet moments and still experiences.

32313: Set in 1927, the tale of a Berlin high school student who gets caught in a complicated romantic web when his best friend named Guenther, a poet named Paul and his shamelessly seductive sister, Hilde, all embark on a four-day orgy of alcohol, drugs, and sexual liaisons.

88326: Jackals, Arabs and Europeans, mob, mass, individual – following Deleuze: who will solve the riddle of the world in this short story by Kafka?  —Locarno

30342: Mickey and Minnie play the uke and dance for a few brief moments – then it’s on to the main body of the short as Goofy surfs, Pluto fights with a crab, and Donald sets himself on fire.

14097: During an outrageous memorial for a Southern patriarch, an unexpected romance blooms between a young woman and man.

1733: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles and downfalls.

95435: We Are Legion: The Story of the Hacktivists

129285: Schneider vs. Bax is a Dutch film directed by Alex van Warmerdam, starring Tom Dewispelaere and Warmerdam. It tells the story of a contract killer who has one day to assassinate a reclusive writer.

17: “In 3 days, you’re dead.”  At first, Nina and her friends think this text message is a joke.  But then, the body count begins to rise, and Nina may be the only one who can stop it…

6752: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense. Her poise, graciousness and stoicism impress nearly everyone who meets her. Her husband is certainly without doubt; so is the district officer; while her lawyer’s doubts may be a natural skepticism.

150301: Bruce Wayne is missing. Alfred covers for him while Nightwing and Robin patrol Gotham City in his stead. And a new player, Batwoman, investigates Batman’s disappearance.

54679: With the Penguin and Rupert Thorne basking in the glow of their criminal deeds in Gotham City, Batwoman has resurfaced to help keep the peace. But when Batwoman herself breaks the law, it’s up to Batman to discover why.

36179: Meek and mild mannered bookkeeper Henry Limpet has few passions in life. It’s mid-1941 and he would love to join the Navy but has been rated 4F. If Henry could have one thing it would be to become a fish. While on a visit to Coney Island, Henry falls into the water and miraculously gets his wish.

48330: Selin is a business woman who is living with her younger boyfriend at a metropole, Istanbul. During the summer time, they decide to go to the south by their car and a long vacation starts.

51999: When his castle is exorcised, Dracula plots his revenge against the Monsignor who performed the rites by attempting to make the holy man’s young niece his bride.
Dracula Has Risen from the Grave

95799: Shipwreck victim Andrew washes up on a tropical island that is ruled by the creepy Dr. Moreau who has a compound staffed by some strange looking servants. He discovers that the natives are experimental duplicates of humans created from wild animals made by the sinister, Dr. Moreau.

2694: Facing a mid-life crisis, a woman rents an apartment next to a psychiatrist’s office to write a new book, only to become drawn to the plight of a pregnant woman seeking that doctor’s help.

34128: Ambitious shoe salesman, Harold, unknowingly meets the boss’ daughter and tells her he is a leather tycoon.

69379: Actor Leonardo DiCaprio’s documentary on the global environmental crisis paints a portrait of a planet at risk while also offering some exciting and radical solutions for making life on earth sustainable.

96592: This video shows the metamorphosis of Christina Aguilera’s slow, yet steady progression of her inner-strength, from being heartbroken, to becoming unbreakable.

114785: Draws on the writings and correspondence of Giacomo Leopardi. With Elio Germano, Michele Riondino, Massimo Popolizio, Anna Mouglalis, Valerio Binasco and Isabella Ragonese.

48254: It tells the story of an Indonesian revolutionary who falls in love with one of his Dutch prisoners.

1987: A mixture of original interviews and archival footage and photographs sheds light on the life experiences of Mike Tyson.

Aileen: Life and Death of a Serial Killer

44044: Thirteen-year-old Lou Bertignac is a gifted but lonely child. At high school she is already in fifth form, two years ahead of the other students, but she has no friends.
